attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
since contracting i have not had steady work for well over a year.
I spend a lot of time at the dole office.
I CANNOT save, as i spend as much time out of work as in it.
I CANNOT save for a pension as i spend as much time out of work as in it.
I CANNOT find permanent work as employers have jumped on the bandwagon of contracting as they dont have to pay us perks, once you start contracting agencies etc dont believe you when you say you want to go permanent. I have NO career!! No training...and NO Pension.
How is this good, Gordon???
